name: Fruity Frog
description:
Fruity Frog is a timing based input game where you play as a little frog who has to catch flies to protect his fruit. Use your quick tongue cleverly and catch the flies before they steal your fruit! So watch out, if you miss too many, you'll soon run out of fruit!

Reach us, behind the scenes and memes on our socials:

https://linktr.ee/fruityfrog.thegame

CONTROLS

Press  X  to start

Combine arrow keys to look at/catch the flies

Example:  <  +  ^  catch upper left flies
